amendment.description: Amendment prohibits banks from discriminating against victims of domestic violence; and allows mutual insurance companies to redomesticate and reorganize into a mutual holding company or into a stock company.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 10 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to prohibit discrimination against victims of domestic violence and to allow mutual insurance companies to redomesticate to another state and reorganize into a mutual holding company or stock company.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bliley amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 203 (Roll no. 273).
